overview: Three pranksters, Ryan, Ado and Luna, a group of college students who always skip class put an old granny on top of an electric pole for jokes. The angry granny then puts a curse on Ryan. At home, Ryan finds his mother has turned into a statue. Then they link the incident with the legend of Malin Kundang and trying to find solutions by visiting shamans and paranormals.
title: Bukan Malin Kundang
